data.features: User can delete and create fully customizable posts with all features of Wordpress editor - Gutenberg. Comments section. Contact form. Fast page randering.
data.description: Es-possible-clone is, as the title suggest, a clone of a website I made in WordPress for a client. Webpage is made in Gatsbyjs to show my skills as programmer. There are no post or exercises because headless WordPress require live host for wordpress-gatsby-source plugin to work and I decided to make this project totally free of any charge. Data and post are fetched from official gatsby starter "gatsby-starter-wordpress-blog".
data.stack: Gatsby.js, React.js, Node, Graphql, Tailwind, Headless Cms: Wordpress Headless Cms, GraphComments, Formspree
data.title: Es-possible clone

data.features: Programmatically made: Blog Pages, tags, pagination, images rendering, Gatsby images, styled components, desktop and mobile view - support for < 640px and 1024px
data.description: Homemade Polish Alcohols is a personal blog about making uncommon, regional alcohols from fruits growing in my area. Blog is made with the use of Gatsby.js and Headless CMS.
data.title: Homemade Polish Alcohols

data.features: Data presentation using data from json file, dynamic filtering over data, tags
data.description: I made this page using design from Fontend mentor. Site features listing job offers by tags with usage of json markdown, React and Tailwind.
data.title: Job listings with filtering solution
